**_"when they're gone, they're gone!"_**

A promotional offer running throughout May 2019, or until stock is depleted, whichever comes first.

    OVZ-512 May 2019 Promo
    1 vCore,
    512mb RAM,
    15gb RAID Storage,
    1TB Bandwidth (1G Port in London, 100M Port in Varna)
    1 IPv4
    /64 IPv6
    OpenVZ 6
    Unmanaged
    £9/yr ~ £0.75/m

_Order Links:_ [London, UK](https://quadhost.net/account/cart.php?a=add&pid=244) | [Varna, BG](https://quadhost.net/account/cart.php?a=add&pid=245)

Based on OpenVZ6; migration of these instances to OpenVZ7 will be possible before OVZ6 is EOL later this year as with all our other OpenVZ VM's.

Orders will be instantly activated, subject to passing anti-fraud checks on signup - any held/flagged orders will be reviewed on request within 24 hours.

FUSE, TUN/TAP can be enabled from the management portal, rDNS also available for customer configuration on both IPv4 and IPv6 blocks.

If you have any questions feel free to [open a sales ticket](https://quadhost.net/account/submitticket.php?step=2&deptid=4). 

PayPal, Stripe & Coinify are accepted. Billing available in GBP, EUR & USD based on current exchange rates. All pricing is VAT exclusive, where applicable VAT will be added at the final stage of checkout.
